sources.title: Cause of Death | Full Movie | Crime, Thriller, Femme Fatale | Joan Severance
sources.description:
DA Taylor Lewis (Patrick Bergin) finds himself falling for his chief suspect (Joan Severance) during a high profile murder investigation.

Directed by Marc S. Grenier
2002
Starring Patrick Bergin, Maxim Roy, Joan Severance, Michael Ironside
Genre: Crime, Mystery, Thriller, Romance

#thrillermovies #mysterymovies #femmefatale

sources.title: Cause of Death (2001) When justice gets personal, who’s playing who? 4K
sources.description:
Taylor Lewis, a deputy district attorney, dives into the case of a murdered mayor’s cousin and quickly finds himself tangled up with the femme fatale, Angela Carter. As Taylor follows the clues, he’s never sure if Angela’s helping him solve the crime—or just playing him for a fool.

Original title: Cause of Death (2001) 

Director: Marc S. Grenier
Writers: Les Weldon

Main cast:
Patrick Bergin - Taylor Lewis
Maxim Roy - Missy Baldwin
Joan Severance - Angela Carter
Michael Ironside - Jonas Phifer
Eugene Clark - Det. Carmine De Luca
Edward Yankie - Sean Malloy
Vlasta Vrana - Al Bailey
Michael Rudder - Clive Johnson
Larry Day - Luke Carter
Cas Anvar - Leonard Sheck
John Dunn-Hill - Domenico Vittorio
Dean Hagopian - Max Farmer
Janine Theriault - Catherine Bicks-Ahmed
Harry Standjofski - Dr. Earl Waxman
David Sharp - Moe Fritkin
Robert Brewster - Ben Stiles
Gayle Garfinkle - Mrs. Geiger
Amanda Strawn - Judge Blackburn
Mark Antony Krupa - Manny McManus
Joanna Noyes - Vera Summers

Genres: Crime, Mystery, Romance, Thriller
Release date: January 10, 2001
Filming location: Montréal, Québec, Canada

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdYTMq_LE7cyJT3fio8pHOP8

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: A deputy-district attorney, assigned to investigate the murder of the mayor's cousin, finds himself falling for the victim's wife.
metadata.Actors: Patrick Bergin, Maxim Roy, Joan Severance
